features: Upgrade Cap Design - The unique V-shaped spout design focuses on all the liquid in the spout. It pours very silky, and it is easy to control the amount. With a V-shaped cover, it can not cause the spout to accumulate and not cause a mess. Perfect for everyday laundry!

Lightweight & High-Quality - The laundry detergent dispenser bottles are Lightweight and are easier to use while doing laundry rather than hauling heavy detergent containers. They no longer break your back and replace those heavy laundry soap jugs. These detergent dispenser bottles are made of super strong PET material, high hardness, and sturdy.

Muti-Use - These laundry soap dispensers with pour lids are perfect for all types of liquid and powder laundry supplies. Come with 6 water-proof minimalist labels: scent booster beads, laundry detergent, fabric softeners, borax powder, fabric softeners, and stain remover.

Reorganizing Your Laundry Room - Perfect for keeping a clean look and save space. Holds a good amount of detergent with 40 oz. Make the laundry room look better and replace the big white laundry box or plastic bottle.

Perfect Gift for Storage Lovers: These laundry detergent containers are stylish and simple, decorating your laundry room. It is a nice addition to the newly remodeled laundry room and the best choice for gifts.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Detergent Dispensers with Pouring Lids are Perfect for All Types of Liquid and Powder Laundry Supplies These refillable dispenser bottles are made of high-quality PET material, high quality, anti-fall and sturdy. With a V-shaped mouth design, easy and focus to pour, with no leak and pool up. The top-opening cap makes it easy to add a variety of laundry detergents and scent-enhancing beads.

Perfect for Laundry Room Makeover, Looks Great In Your Laundry Room! The laundry detergent dispenser bottles work great and are easier to use every day while doing laundry rather than hauling heavy detergent containers. Made of shatterproof and lightweight PET material, you don't have to worry about shattering, even if you drop them. Use these bottles for everyday laundry and no longer break your back lifting those heavy laundry soap jugs.

A New Generation of Thoughtful Design Other: The liquid pools up and stays in the lid making a messy and irritating experienceOur: Upgraded V-shaped spout design silky pours and wide opening, not to pool up in the lid. Keeping a clean look and making people add happiness.Choose a detergent dispenser that doesn't leak, instead of one that performs poorly and wastes detergent. Curved Bottle Take A Comfortable Hand Touch The sleek and curved bottle body design is easy to operate with one hand, making it easier to hold the bottle without a lot of effort. Our laundry soap dispenser bottles seem slim but hold 40 oz - a good amount of detergent. It doesn’t take up much space, and is very convenient for home storage. Come With 6 Pcs Water-proof Labels Come with 6 pcs simple and fashionable labels, not only can wate-rproof and don't worry about the label getting dirty and wet, to avoid repeated replacement of your labels. Clear bottles with pre-made stickers, you will know at a glance which detergent is in the bottle and when it needs to be refilled.

Perfect Gift for Storage Lovers and Homemakers These laundry detergent containers are stylish, simple, functional, and beautify your laundry room. It is a nice addition to the laundry room and the best choice for a housewarming gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Detergent dispensers for laundry
reviews.reviewText: I love these makes it easy, see thru, the plastic is extremely durable, you can open and close without any issues, good thinking and stylish for your laundry area, hoping pods for detergent don't eat thru these time will be the test or make clear plastic foggy, will wait to see, but I'm happy w purchase and delivery was timely, wl recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality is amazing
reviews.reviewText: The quality of these are just amazing! Super hard plastic, I used to have the regular juice jars for detergent and softener but these seem much more sturdier and better quality. It’s great they taught of everything and sent even the labels over. Very thoughtful. Also they sent an extra lid in case one of them breaks you have a back up. Loved this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I put my laundry detergent on these. Easy to pour liquids to the washing machine with no mess. The only down side is that I can't shake the bottle because liquid does come out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the ease of these bottles and the labels that came included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty laundry bottles
reviews.reviewText: A set of 2 plastic laundry bottles. Came with a variety of vinyl labels and 2 plastic tops. Tops snap close securely. Looks nice and keeps everything organized. Good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were a business purchase, I clean vacation rentals and these were perfect! They look beautiful and very professional... hopefully guests can use properly and keep clean... they are not an airtight seal so you don't want to tip the bottle....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Messy!!! Use for powders only
reviews.reviewText: Ughhhhh… I wanted some thing that would look cute and tidy in my laundry room for liquids, but these were more messy, drippy and annoying trouble than they were worth. Only use for powders. I use borax in one and the other is empty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and helpful solution for dripping containers
reviews.reviewText: These are easy to use and I like the fact that they have a spout and a lid that explicitly covers that spout. I use one for laundry detergent and one for mixing fertilizer to water houseplants. These look clean and are very helpful.My only complaint is the height. They’re tall enough that they don’t fit under a typical bathroom sink or close to the detergent area in the washing machine. In the washer I just pour from a bit higher up and it’s fine. For filling when diluting houseplant fertilizer, I use the tub or kitchen sink, depending on what is closest, which works pretty well too. Overall I really like these.
